name: Resist Alert
description:
Replaces the "Resist!" text with "This character or monster resisted a debuff." and adds a visual icon as reaction to whenever a monster or character (includes yourself) resists a debuff.
This addon cannot know the difference between which skill was resisted or if it was a player or not, if the visual icon is bad for you it is possible to be disabled. The commands are: /resist balloon to disable the icon, /resist effect to disable the status effect text change.

name: Fishing Spy
description: Shows the owner of other player's Tackle Box.

name: Boss Notice
description: Helps to keep track of Demon Lords spawn notice. Use /bosslog or /bl to show icon again.

name: Easy Mount
description:
Teleports your companion to your position if it's too far when trying to mount.

Commands:
/cptoggle: Toggles the state of your companion.

name: Guild no-crash!
description: Fix the guild infinite loop/crashing issue when logging on characters on some guilds.

name: BarrackItemList Edited
description:
Change inventory store format for faster loading.
 Use /il lang en for english translation.
